Line Clamp

# Line Clamp

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                   | Support        |
| ----------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
line-clamp-1
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
line-clamp-2
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
line-clamp-3
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
line-clamp-4
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
line-clamp-5
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
line-clamp-6
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
line-clamp-none
``` | ✅ Full Support |
